name: Pokémon Feuergrün
storyline: The time has come! You're finally old enough to own your first Pokemon! Of course Professor Eiche is kind enough to give you 3 to choose from. But when you go to his lab to choose one, you burst into a robbery. A Team ShockIt member steals Eiche's E and the 3 Pokémon! What now? You can't go after them to get the Pokémon back, because the boy at the end of the dump won't let you on Route 1 without a Pokémon. By a happy coincidence, Maike comes by! Despite being a total novice when it comes to Pokémon, she does own one. Finally, she does you the favor of retrieving the Pokémon. At first the task seems very simple. Run to Team ShockIt's HQ, defeat the few members, and retrieve the Pokémon and the E. But the Pokémon and the E have already been taken away. In a top secret laboratory. There they try to create the ultimate Pokemon! To make matters worse, after storming Team ShockIt HQ, the police are after you. After all, you trespassed!
summary: Pokémon Feuergrün (eng.: Pokémon Firegreen) is a German Pokémon parody fan game made in RPG Maker based on Pokémon FireRed and Pokémon LeafGreen.
